scenes.description: Kanata continues her emotional farewell message to Coco in the student council office.
The 4th Gen members gather together. Kanata presents Coco with a group message board from all hololive members.
The members become emotional and cry together. Coco expresses her deep gratitude to everyone.
Coco tries to lighten the mood while the members express that their bond as 4th Gen is eternal.
Tokoyami Towa gives her supportive message to Coco, respecting her decision for the future.
The members discuss leaving a 'Dragon Seat' open for Coco at future hololive events.
Coco gives an encouraging speech to the others and jokes about taking YAGOO's seat in the future.
Tsunomaki Watame offers a heartfelt wish for Coco's happiness.
Coco tells everyone to wipe their tears and face the upcoming live concert with smiles.
Coco addresses the viewers and fans, thanking them for their support of 4th Gen.

subtitles.original: ...て、みんなに優しさをくれた姿。
subtitles.english: ...and for showing kindness to everyone.

subtitles.original: 辛いことがあったとき、強がって平気のふりをしていたけど
subtitles.english: I've seen you putting on a brave face and pretending everything was fine during the hard times,

subtitles.original: 本当は一人で悩んでいた姿
subtitles.english: when in reality you were worrying about it alone.

subtitles.original: ホロライブに活気をくれた姿、全部忘れないよ。
subtitles.english: I've seen you bring prosperity to hololive. And I'll never forget any of that!

subtitles.original: 本当に、本当によく頑張ったね。
subtitles.english: You did a really, really great job!

subtitles.original: 誰よりも大好きだ。かなココは永遠だもんな。
subtitles.english: I love you more than anyone! KanaCoco is forever!

subtitles.original: これからもよろしくね。今夜はハーゲンを奢ってくれよな。
subtitles.english: Let's keep it going! And you're treating me to some Häagen tonight, right?

subtitles.original: お前が奢れよ！
subtitles.english: You treat me!

subtitles.original: ということで、僕もね、実は急いで書きました。
subtitles.english: Oh, man... Okay, done. I had to write all that in a rush, too.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、こんな...
subtitles.english: And, like... It looks pretty bad...

subtitles.original: ちょっと... ちょっと...
subtitles.english: Let me... Let me...

subtitles.original: きったねえな。あ、ごめん、そこでいいの？あの
subtitles.english: Damn, that's packed. Let me take this chance now.

subtitles.original: ホロライブのみんなにちょっと呼びかけをしまして、僕、ちょっと寄せ書きをみんなに書いてもらいました。
subtitles.english: Hmm? I reached out to the other hololive members, and got them to write messages for you.

subtitles.original: マジで？！
subtitles.english: What?!

subtitles.original: なのでちょっとちゃんと、ちゃんとしたものもね、出したいと思います。本当に。
subtitles.english: And now I'll hand the whole thing over.

subtitles.original: あー！本当にもう、みんなからだ。ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Ahh! Seriously... It's seriously from all of hololive. Thank you so much for everything.

subtitles.original: ココちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Coco-chan!

subtitles.original: みんなありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you all!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい泣きなの、うう...
subtitles.english: These are tears of joy.

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとう、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 手紙渡すの忘れた。
subtitles.english: Oh, I forgot to hand you my letter!

subtitles.original: みんな大好きだ！
subtitles.english: Love you all!

subtitles.original: みんなあの、えー、泣かすんじゃないよ！
subtitles.english: So, uh... Don't make me cry, dammit!

subtitles.original: 誰が泣かせたのは？せっかく盛り上げたのにみんな泣かせたのは！
subtitles.english: Who made it wain in here after I livened things up?!

subtitles.original: 我慢してたのに！
subtitles.english: I thought I was all out of tears!

subtitles.original: あのー、まあ、４期生のみんなとはね、あの、申し訳ないことをしたね。でも。
subtitles.english: Well, um... I feel bad for putting you guys through this.

subtitles.original: 何がだよ！
subtitles.english: What do you mean?

subtitles.original: えーもう、やだー
subtitles.english: Huh? I mean, uh...

subtitles.original: いや、卒業をね、まあ、そういうことになったっていうことだ。だね。
subtitles.english: The fact that I'm graduating.

subtitles.original: そんなことないよ！
subtitles.english: Don't feel bad.

subtitles.original: うんうん。
subtitles.english: Yeah, don't.

subtitles.original: ずっと５人だから。
subtitles.english: We'll always be five in spirit.

subtitles.original: すごい、たぶんいっぱいっぱい、すごい長い間考えて決めたことだと思うから、
subtitles.english: I know you spent a lot of time mulling over the decision.

subtitles.original: 私たちはそれをいけないことだと思ってないし、
subtitles.english: All of us think you're entitled to that decision,

subtitles.original: ココが新しい道を進むっていうのも、私たちはすごい応援をする。し、
subtitles.english: and we'll cheer you on in whatever you do next.

subtitles.original: 本当に、さっきも言ったけど、私たちが５人で４期生っていうことは絶対変わらないから、
subtitles.english: Also, like I said, the fact that there's five of us won't ever change.

subtitles.original: うん、寂しいけど。
subtitles.english: We'll miss you, though.

subtitles.original: そう、なんかイベントがあったときとかは、ドラゴン席があるし。
subtitles.english: We'll leave a dragon-sized seat open whenever there's an event and stuff.

subtitles.original: ドラゴン席！
subtitles.english: Dragon-sized!

subtitles.original: そうだよ、ドラゴン席！用意してくれるかい？
subtitles.english: That's right! Dragon-sized! Will you really?

subtitles.original: 用意してるでしょ！
subtitles.english: Of course we will!

subtitles.original: あー。じゃあちょっと最前列でお拝見させてくれよな。
subtitles.english: Cool! Then you'll see me looking all proud in the front row.

subtitles.original: 最っ強の御出組み足組ませてもらうわ。
subtitles.english: The proudest of onlookers.

subtitles.original: やってくれよな。
subtitles.english: Do it, seriously.

subtitles.original: みんな、ホロライブに残って、あ、残りじゃねえや、ホロライブに残って、
subtitles.english: I believe you guys will keep... Wait, correction. I believe you guys will keep...

subtitles.original: どこまでもね輝いていけると思っています。
subtitles.english: ...shining bright here in hololive.

subtitles.original: 私はね、ホロライブからは居なくなっちゃいますけど、
subtitles.english: As for me, I'll be leaving hololive,

subtitles.original: まあ私はね、たぶん、あの、どこ行っても輝いちゃうんで。ね！
subtitles.english: but I know I'll shine bright wherever I go. Right!

subtitles.original: かっけーな！
subtitles.english: Damn, you cool!

subtitles.original: どこ行っても輝いちゃうから！
subtitles.english: I'll shine no matter where I go!

subtitles.original: 辛くなったらいつでも戻って来いよ。
subtitles.english: Feel free to come back if things go south.

subtitles.original: おう、そうだね。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: まあ、YAGOOが死んだ頃に戻って来るわ。YAGOOが死んだら連絡しような。
subtitles.english: Well, YAGOO will probably be dead by then. Get in touch once he is.

subtitles.original: YAGOOが死んだら連絡くれよ、私がYAGOOの席に。
subtitles.english: Let me know when he passes. Let me know when he passes.

subtitles.original: 死ななくても連絡しようよ！
subtitles.english: Can we keep in touch even otherwise?!

subtitles.original: 本当だよ！普通だよ！
subtitles.english: We should, huh? Truly.

subtitles.original: まあね、また会えるさ。
subtitles.english: Well, we'll see each other again.

subtitles.original: え、また会えるさ！
subtitles.english: We'll see each other again!

subtitles.original: 会えるさ！会えるよ！
subtitles.english: Yeah, we can! We will!

subtitles.original: 誰よりも幸せでいてくれ。
subtitles.english: Please be happy. You deserve it more than anyone.

subtitles.original: 幸せだよ！
subtitles.english: I already am!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、わため！
subtitles.english: Thanks... Watame!

subtitles.original: よしよし。ほら笑顔でお別れだぞ。
subtitles.english: There, there. Let's say our goodbyes with a smile.

subtitles.original: ね、この後はライブもあるから。
subtitles.english: We've got a show to put on.

subtitles.original: そうそう、こっからこっから。
subtitles.english: We're just getting started!

subtitles.original: あの、あ！鼻水拭いてください。
subtitles.english: So... Ack! Wipe your nose!

subtitles.original: 鼻水拭きます。
subtitles.english: Wipe your nose.

subtitles.original: 顔ぐちゃぐちゃなのな。
subtitles.english: Doing just that!

subtitles.original: えーっと、みんなにね、視聴者の皆さんずっと応援してくれたファンの皆さん、
subtitles.english: Um, well, to all my viewers, all my fans who've supported me,

subtitles.original: ４期生をね、大好きでずっと応援してくれていたファンの皆さんもね、
subtitles.english: and 4th Gen fans who have loved and supported us...

subtitles.original: たくさんいると思うから。
subtitles.english: I'm sure there's a bunch of you.
